attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Considering the huge attention and turnout for the London mayoral elections, it is in the interest of British democracy that all major cities in the United Kingdom to switch immediately to a smiliar system of choosing a mayor. 
Strong, independent local administrations encourage greater turnout and greater accountability. Most of all, they weaken the authoritarian grip of both Labour and Conservative Central office.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
